ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:0.5_0: The training rule on sitting down without asking permission
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:1.2_0: At that time the nun Thullanandā visited families after the meal, and she sat down and lay down on the seats without asking permission of the owners.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:1.3_0: Feeling scruples because of Thullanandā, people there neither sat down nor lay down.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:1.4_0: People complained and criticized the monks,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:1.5_0: “How could Venerable Thullanandā act in this way?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:1.6_0: Nuns heard the complaints of those people,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:1.7_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:1.8_0: “How can Venerable Thullanandā act like this?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:1.9_0: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Thullanandā did this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:1.12_0: “... How could the nun Thullanandā act in this way?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:1.13_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:1.14_0: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:1.15.1_0: ‘If a nun visits families after the meal, and then sits down or lies down on a seat without asking permission of the owners, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:2.1.4_0: ...The nun who has been given the full ordination by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:2.1.6_0: when the middle of the day has passed, until sunset.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:2.1.8_0: there are four kinds of family: the aristocratic family, the brahmin family, the merchant family, the worker family.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:2.1.11_0: Without asking permission of the owners:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:2.1.12_0: not having asked permission of a person in that family who is an owner and who has the authority to give.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:2.1.14_0: a place for sitting cross-legged is what is meant.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:2.1.16_0: if she sits down on it, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:2.1.18_0: if she lies down on that seat, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:2.2.1_0: If she has not asked permission, and she does not perceive that she has, and she sits down or lies down on a seat, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:2.2.2_0: If she has not asked permission, but she is unsure of it, and she sits down or lies down on a seat, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:2.2.3_0: If she has not asked permission, but she perceives that she has, and she sits down or lies down on a seat, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:2.2.4_0: If it is not a place for sitting cross-legged, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:2.2.5_0: If she has asked permission, but she does not perceive that she has, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:2.2.6_0: If she has asked permission, but she is unsure of it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:2.2.7_0: If she has asked permission, and she perceives that she has, there is no offense.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:2.3.1_0: there is no offense for him.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:2.3.2_0: if she sits down or lies down after asking permission;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:2.3.3_0: if the seat is permanently put out for her;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:2.3.7_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:2.3.8_0: The sixth training rule is finished.
